But thanks in part to fixes I proposed and @POTUS implemented, nurses, service members, firefighters, and other public servants are finally getting their student loan debt forgiven.

Don't worry, there's no emergency! The test is being run to ensure Americans hear from agencies ASAP in case of a real emergency.

The US went over the child care cliff this weekend, and now millions of children may lose their daycare.
 
Instead of working on a fix, House Republicans did nothing. Families need us to pass the Child Care Stabilization Act now.

We just passed a bill to avert a government shutdown.

This is good news for millions of families who’ve been preparing for a painful shutdown, but it’s only a temporary solution. We can’t put them through this again. Time to get serious and get the job done.

I encourage everyone in New York City, Long Island, and the Hudson Valley to follow emergency guidance and stay safe.
 
I'll work to get all the federal resources we need to recover from this historic flooding.
It was a privilege to serve with someone as extraordinary as Dianne Feinstein.

Devastated to hear of the passing of my longtime friend, Senator Dianne Feinstein. Through her tenure in Congress, she was a leader for women’s rights and a trailblazer for women elected officials. My heart is with her entire family. Dianne will be terribly missed.
It was so great to have Buffalo Nite back here in D.C.! The City of Good Neighbors brought its best — from wings to life-sized Josh Allen cutouts. See you all at the next one!

This is excellent news that will strengthen the relationship between the U.S. and Israel and increase tourism and travel between our two nations!
From Wayne County, Michigan, to Tappan, New York, we’re standing with working families. #StandUpUAW

If the government shuts down, nearly 7 million moms, babies, and kids could be cut off from their WIC benefits within days. Infant formula and fresh, healthy foods could be out of reach.
 
House Republicans' petty politics would risk millions of moms and babies going hungry.

Had a great meeting with President @arvarice of @NYUrbanLeague! I was proud to secure federal funding to support the remodeling of their HQ, and I won’t stop fighting for more funding to help them continue their important work. Thank you for everything you do at @NYUrbanLeague!
My heart goes out to Tom’s family and loved ones, as well as everyone at @steelworkers. Tom was a powerful champion for unions and working families, and I know he’ll be sorely missed.

I'm in Central Park — one of the most iconic green spaces in the world — to announce $20 million in federal funding to expand green space access in New York City. This funding will help increase the quality of life for New Yorkers and help keep our communities cool!
Solidarity with @UAWRegion9A! Keep fighting through rain or shine for the fair wages and benefits you deserve!
Wishing a meaningful and peaceful fast to everyone observing Yom Kippur today.
Far too many communities have been devastated by gun violence in New York and across the country. Now is the time to take bold action to end the gun violence epidemic. Thank you, @POTUS!

My heart goes out to the students, families, and all those involved in this horrific crash. My office and I are closely monitoring this situation, and we're grateful for the first responders who worked so hard to save lives. abc7ny.com/bus-crash-orange-…

I was proud to join members of the SUNY community today for their #SUNYDayDC!

I'm working hard to ensure that college students can access SNAP benefits and take advantage of opportunities such as the Cyber Academy. I'll never stop fighting for New York's best and brightest!

.@ZelenskyyUa gave us an update on the war in Ukraine this morning. His people have been fighting bravely to defend their freedom — and our support has been critical. The United States must never waver in our defense of democracy.

I'm grateful the Biden administration heeded our call to redesignate Venezuela for Temporary Protected Status, which will allow asylum seekers in New York to access work permits more quickly. It's common sense – and it will relieve some of the pressure on our city and state.

12 years ago, we finally succeeded in repealing the anti-LGBTQ+ policy of Don't Ask Don't Tell in our military, so that Americans don't have to fear discrimination based on who they love when they choose to serve. I'll never stop fighting for the rights of our LGBTQ+ community.

.@POTUS just announced the creation of the American Climate Corps, which will prepare thousands of young Americans for clean energy and climate resilience jobs.
 
I've been fighting to create a climate corps for years, and I'm so proud to see this become a reality!

50 years ago today, @BillieJeanKing won the historic "Battle of the Sexes" match, proving to the world that women athletes deserved to be respected—and paid—just as much as men.

In recognition of her lifelong fight for equality, I've nominated her for a Congressional Gold Medal.

If you’re a veteran who deployed to a combat zone and left the military between Sept. 11, 2001 and Oct. 1, 2013, you can apply for @DeptVetAffairs health care benefits until Sept. 30, 2023.

Thanks to the PACT Act, veterans have expanded access to health care and benefits.

With federal funding for child care providers set to expire soon, I'm announcing the Child Care Stabilization Act to provide $16 billion annually to U.S. providers. American families deserve affordable child care, and I'm fighting to keep that a reality. rochesterfirst.com/news/loca…
Shana Tova to everyone in New York and across the country who is celebrating Rosh Hashanah! Wishing you all a happy and healthy new year.

En este #MesdelaHerenciaHispana celebramos las increíbles contribuciones que los latinos han hecho a Nueva York y nuestra nación. La diversidad es una de nuestras mayores fortalezas y continuaré luchando por todas las comunidades latinas en nuestro estado.

This #HispanicHeritageMonth we celebrate the incredible contributions that Latinos have made to New York and our nation. Diversity is one of our greatest strengths, and I’ll continue to fight for all Latino communities in our state.
Proud to stand with @UAW. Everyone deserves a fair, dignified wage.

I joined garment workers for a quick strategy session this week before we reintroduced the #FABRICAct, my bill to protect garment workers’ labor rights and revitalize the American garment manufacturing industry.

Today I’m reintroducing the #FABRICAct, my landmark bill to protect garment workers' labor rights and revitalize the American garment manufacturing industry. And this week, nearly 80 garment workers and advocates from across the country joined me to help reintroduce our bill!

Since Roe was overturned, there have been many attempts to curtail women's basic freedoms, including the right to travel freely. It cannot stand — we must keep fighting to protect women's bodily autonomy, right to privacy, and basic civil rights. al.com/news/2023/08/alabama-…

With the help of the Bipartisan Safer Communities Act, which made gun trafficking a federal crime, 240 guns were removed from the streets of Cleveland.

Every illegal gun seized is a step in the right direction toward ending gun violence nationwide. cleveland.com/court-justice/…

We promised to #NeverForget the service or sacrifice of 9/11 first responders. That means we must ensure they always have the health care we promised them. Congress must pass our bipartisan legislation in the Senate NDAA to help close the funding gap in the 9/11 Health Program.

We join together as a country today to mourn those we lost on September 11, 2001.

We will never forget that horrific day 22 years ago. But we will always honor and remember the victims, the first responders, and everyone who risked and sacrificed so much to save others that day.

SNAP's Employment and Training program provides crucial training to people trying to get a job to become self-sufficient. But by earning a wage, some can actually be kicked off of SNAP. That's absolutely ridiculous, and I'm introducing a bill to fix this. wbng.com/2023/09/07/gillibra…

I'm at @SyrCommHltCtr, where a new state-of-the-art facility is being built for community health and OBGYN care. I'll keep fighting to pass my Moms Matter Act, which would provide funding for community organizations like this one to support women and new moms nationwide.

I'm at @TrilliumNY in Rochester today to announce my Moms Matter Act. The US has the highest maternal mortality rate among developed nations. That's unacceptable. We need to pass the Moms Matter Act and fight this crisis with everything we have.

I’m at @WestchesterMed with @AndreaSCousins to announce my Moms Matter Act, a bill to help fight the maternal mortality crisis. I'm excited they're bringing the new Center for Women’s Health Equity to Westchester. My bill would help fund efforts like theirs to support new moms!

35 Down: K – I – R – S – T – E – N 🖊️

We're rapidly approaching a child care cliff. If federal funding isn't renewed soon, 70,000 daycares could close nationwide. That includes nearly 6,000 daycares caring for 252,000 kids in New York.
 
Congress must act to avert this crisis. nypost.com/2023/09/06/70k-da…

I'm deeply saddened to hear of the passing of Ruschell Boone, an incredible journalist and anchor for @NY1. My thoughts are with her family and loved ones during this difficult time. Ruschell will be deeply missed. ny1.com/nyc/all-boroughs/new…

The labor movement has made incredible strides this year as thousands of workers have stood together and fought for fair pay, fair benefits, and better workplaces.

When unions are strong, working families are strong — and I'm proud to fight alongside you this #LaborDay!

I've been working directly with AARO to make it easier for current or former U.S. government employees, service members, or contractors to report UAP incidents. This is a matter of national security. This week, AARO finally launched their official website: aaro.mil
And with that, I’ve officially visited all 62 New York counties in 2023!

I'm at @HWCLI on Long Island today to announce my Moms Matter Act, a bill to help combat the maternal health crisis. The U.S. has the highest maternal mortality rate among industrialized nations — we must do more to put an end to preventable maternal deaths.

I was honored to join the newest group of future service members at today’s enlistment ceremony at the @NYSFair. These young men and women are answering a call to service — a call to dedicate themselves to something greater. May God bless and protect them all!
There's no better place to be this week than at the @NYSFair! I couldn’t leave without a cone of soft serve and a visit to the butter sculpture!🍦

.@rpi is one of the world's leading research institutions and a point of immense pride for New York State. I was excited to tour some of their new facilities today that will keep them on the cutting edge of technology, manufacturing, and scientific advancement.

Yesterday I joined Mayor Gary McCarthy to see some of the economic and community development projects in Schenectady. The waterfront development has opened up boating and biking to the Mohawk River, and the new aquatic center will bring thousands of visitors every year!

I'm in Buffalo with @RepBrianHiggins and @HHCWNY to announce $1 million in funding for a new Hispanic Heritage Cultural Institute. This building will be home to incredible resources that will inspire appreciation for the Hispanic community in Western New York for generations.

Since the 1980 Winter Olympics, Lake Placid has brought people from around the world to relive history in one of New York's most scenic locations. I was honored to tour the historic Olympic facilities today, including the newly designed museum, and I cannot wait to be back!

I'm proud to join @redcrossny and @FDNY to #SoundTheAlarm on home fires. Fire safety precautions can save lives. That's why @redcrossny will install free smoke detectors and provide fire safety education to families in their homes. Sign up at soundthealarm.org/gny.

Thanks to the Inflation Reduction Act, Medicare is finally allowed to negotiate lower drug prices—and @POTUS just announced the first ten drugs that will be negotiated. The days of seniors having to choose between their medicine or putting food on the table are coming to an end.

103 years ago — after a movement started in Seneca Falls, NY — the 19th Amendment was certified into the Constitution, giving women the right to vote. On this #WomensEqualityDay, we celebrate the women who came before us and fight for a better future for the women of tomorrow.

Were you the victim of SNAP skimming?

Thanks to legislation I wrote and passed, you can finally have your stolen benefits replaced.

NYC residents can apply online here: nyc.gov/site/hra/help/benefi…

Residents of all other NY counties can learn more here: otda.ny.gov/workingfamilies/…

I wrote and passed the SNAP Theft Protection Act so that families whose SNAP benefits were stolen won’t go hungry. Thank you @LegalAidNYC for your support.

If you are a victim of SNAP skimming and need help reclaiming your stolen benefits, fill out the application linked below.

The best part of our #NYRoadTrip has been reconnecting with our families and friends all over the state! Erin works in my DC office now, but we had to see her family while we were at the Wyoming County Fair, where she used to show animals with 4-H!

.@theADKX is an amazing repository of the Adirondacks’ diverse people, past, and present. I’m working hard to ensure institutions such as this one have the funding they need to keep providing our communities with important cultural experiences.

Henry and I had a fantastic time in Fulton County at the Caroga Arts Collective! Places like these bring together artists, musicians, and entire communities. And my Rebuild Rural America Act would provide funding so we can keep enjoying them for generations to come!

The Arkell Museum in Montgomery County is a cultural hub for American Art and Mohawk Valley History, and it deserves our support.

I’m happy to be in Canajoharie today to experience the wonders that the Arkell Museum holds, and I’ll always fight to protect funding for the arts.

This past May, farms across New York were devastated by an unexpected frost. I’m grateful that @USDA approved my call with @SenSchumer for a disaster declaration, which provides the affected areas crucial federal funding to aid in their recovery efforts. farmers.gov/protection-recov…

Construction is underway at Auburn Community Hospital for a new state-of-the-art cancer center. Thanks to federal funding I helped secure, the facility will be able to provide the resources this community needs to effectively diagnose & treat cancers that impact their residents.

I’m in Albion to announce $2 million in federal funding for Orleans County to modernize and improve their Emergency Operations Center. Until now, it has operated out of a 1960s-era bomb shelter, and these improvements will help the county better serve their 40,000+ residents.

Rick Jeanneret will forever be remembered as the voice of a passionate community of Sabres fans. For decades, he brought together so many through a love of Buffalo sports. My thoughts are with his family during this time, Rick will be deeply missed.
buffalonews.com/sports/sabre…

Today I’m in Genesee County to announce $2 million in federal funding that I helped secure to support the county’s water supply.

This funding will help add more than 7 million gallons of water per day to the county’s water supply, ensuring that they’re never without clean water.

Thanks to the Inflation Reduction Act, manufacturers like @cummins have been able to invest in cutting-edge green manufacturing. We need to protect the Inflation Reduction Act so that American manufacturers can stay ahead of the global competition and invest in their future.
.@Cummins ships its engines all over the world, but every engine that leaves the Jamestown plant leaves with a piece of New York in it. #MadeInNY

Thanks to @chq for hosting today's discussion about protecting our democracy. We have so much work to do — from defending our voting rights to finalizing the Equal Rights Amendment. The fight ahead won't be easy, but I'll never stop working to protect the future of our democracy.

The @Cummins Jamestown Engine Plant is on the cutting edge of cleaner, greener engine manufacturing. I toured their factory today and talked with them about how they're incorporating a zero-emissions strategy into traditional engine manufacturing to better prepare for the future.

I joined members of the Salamanca community yesterday to announce my Rebuild Rural America Act, which would establish a $50 billion fund that would help rural towns across the country work on the projects that their communities desperately need!

It was a joy to visit Willow Creek Farm in Belmont today and see their commitment to caring for their cows and their community. I’m fighting to make sure our dairy farms get a fair price for their milk so our farms and communities can thrive.

The Wyoming County Fair brings together the best of our rural towns — agriculture, local food, small businesses, and great people. I loved visiting talented young 4-Hers and celebrating their accomplishments!

I took a tour today of the falls in Letchworth State Park. New York has some of the most incredible landscapes in the country, and I'm committed to preserving our state's natural beauty for generations to come.
We visited the @corningmuseum for a glassblowing class. How’d we do?
New York's craft breweries are the best in the country — just stop by @upstatebrewing if you don't believe me! Thanks for the welcome and for hosting a conversation with other local craft brewers.

.@ccecornell's Hilltop Community Farm is a hub for teaching and agriculture here in Tioga County. I had a fantastic time touring their new solar array and learning about their farm incubator program, which helps aspiring farmers get started!
Who's excited for @NASCAR weekend at The Glen? Jonnie and I had a fantastic time at @WGI — we even got to take a test drive on the track!

I visited Main Street Farms in Cortland, NY to talk with them about their work growing fresh, organic produce and hemp. We need to make sure our farms get the support and resources they need so they — and the communities they support — can thrive.

I'm proud to join @TourFingerLakes at @buttonwoodgrove  to announce my bill to finally establish the Finger Lakes National Heritage Area! This region has a rich history and incredible natural, recreational, and agricultural resources that must be celebrated and protected!
Jonnie, Henry and I couldn’t take a roadtrip across New York without stopping by the Northeast Classic Car Museum! We could’ve spent all day here — and we’ll definitely be back!

Stopped at @BreweryOmmegang for a drink and a roundtable conversation with local breweries. Our craft brewers are the best in the country — and I'll be fighting for them while working on this year's Farm Bill.
Thank you for the tour, @SUNYDelhi! You're doing fantastic work preparing New Yorkers for their careers in nursing, cyber, and so many other growing fields!

.@Beekman1802Boys started a small business in Sharon Springs, making goat milk soap at their kitchen table. Now they're selling their skincare products nationwide. When New York's small businesses can succeed, local communities can thrive!

5 days.
15 counties.
Our #NYRoadTrip kicks off today!

Hip hop was born 50 years ago in the Bronx. And thanks to $5 million @SenSchumer, @RepBowman, and I secured for the @uhhmuseum, the history of hip hop will be preserved and celebrated in the Bronx for generations to come! #HipHop50

One year ago today, @POTUS signed the #PACTAct into law.

In just one year, over 4 million veterans have been screened for toxic exposure, and hundreds of thousands of claims have been approved.

Veterans are finally getting the care they were promised.

If you were exposed to burn pits or other toxins while serving abroad, you may be eligible for health care or other benefits, thanks to the #PACTAct.

And if you submit your claim by today's deadline, you could get retroactive benefits for this past year: VA.gov/PACT

This is a relief, but we have to do more to make sure that those who shouldn’t have a gun can’t buy, print, or assemble a homemade, untraceable firearm. We need to ban distribution of blueprints for the 3D printing of firearms and prevent the proliferation of ghost guns.

Tonight, voters soundly rejected this undemocratic ballot initiative that tried to throw a roadblock into the fight to codify our reproductive freedom. Voters have sent a clear message — and they are ready for the fight ahead.

In Ilion today, I spoke to local leaders about their plans for a children's center that will connect families and kids with essential services. This is exactly the type of project the government should be supporting — and it's why I'm introducing the Rebuild Rural America Act.

Local leaders know what their communities need most — they just need funding to get the job done. I’m in Lowville to announce my Rebuild Rural America Act, which would establish a $50 billion fund to support projects like the Double Play Community Center that serve rural areas.

.@SenSchumer and I secured funding for the @AFResearchLab in Rome, NY. And today, we were proud to cut the ribbon on their new Extreme Computing Facility, which will conduct research and development of unconventional computing architectures, networks, and processing.
Lisa Hofflich is a senior advisor in my NYC office — and a proud member of @sagaftra. This fight is personal. We are proud to be #SAGAFTRAstrong.

In just one year since Congress passed the #PACTAct, over 300,000 claims have already been approved.

If you or a loved one was exposed to burn pits or other toxins while serving abroad, find out if you're eligible for health care or other benefits at VA.gov/PACT.
Fight for what you are due and the fair wage you are owed. I’m proud to stand with @sagaftra. #SAGAFTRAstrong

Last August we passed the Inflation Reduction Act, which helped lower health care costs for thousands of New Yorkers. I was proud to welcome the #LowerCostsBetterCare bus tour, @ProtectOurCare, and @1199SEIU to NYC to share our progress and continue the fight to lower costs!

The movies we love wouldn't be successful — or profitable — without the hard work of @sagaftra members. They deserve to share in that success. They deserve fair wages and fair benefits. And I'll proudly stand with them until they get a fair contract. #SAGAFTRAstrong

One year ago today, the Senate finally passed the #PACTAct.

It was an honor to fight alongside veterans, advocates, and their loved ones to get this bill over the finish line. Now, thousands of veterans are finally getting the health care and benefits they earned and deserve.

New Yorkers have seen firsthand the devastating impact of untreated mental illness in our communities. That’s why I joined @RepDanGoldman and @RepJerryNadler at @fountainhouse today to announce our bill to provide more resources to treat serious mental illnesses.

I was honored to be at the Hampton Synagogue to celebrate the opening of Jack’s House, a new children's center named in memory of Holocaust survivor Jack Gora. This facility will have an incredible impact on all community members and honor Jack's memory for years to come.

I was in Southampton to announce my Clean Water Standards for PFAS Act of 2023. We need to keep toxic, cancer-causing PFAS chemicals out of our environment and ensure every New Yorker has safe, clean drinking water.

America's Chinatowns are unique cultural institutions, and they need our support. I joined @stirfrygrace to visit a few small businesses in Manhattan's Chinatown last week. Let's shop local, eat local, and #SupportChinatowns!

Towns like Philipstown, NY need support to stop the flow of illicit fentanyl into their communities.

That's why I cosponsored the FEND Off Fentanyl Act — we must keep working to prevent more needless fentanyl overdose deaths in New York and across the country.

Today I’m in Binghamton to announce Senate passage of the FEND Off Fentanyl Act.

This bill will help combat the fentanyl crisis at its source, and I’m proud to announce that the Senate has passed it as part of this year’s National Defense Authorization Act.

Thank you, @POTUS. I'm so grateful we have a commander in chief who recognizes the importance of reforming and professionalizing our military justice system. While it will take time, I know that these reforms will help restore our service members' trust in the system.

Thank you to the first responders from across NY who came to D.C. for my #NYFirstResponders Summit today! We shared productive conversations about the partnership between the federal government and first responders, and I'll keep working hard to strengthen this relationship.

The Senate just passed my bill with @SenSchumer and @SenatorBraun to help close the 9/11 Health Program funding gap — and my team and I shared the incredible news with over 120 New York firefighters, EMTs, and law enforcement officers in DC for my #NYFirstResponders Summit!

Excited to kick off my #NYFirstResponders Summit here in Washington, D.C.! I'm proud to bring together firefighters, police, EMTs, and sheriffs from across New York to discuss the challenges they face and to ensure that the federal government is working in partnership with them.

Public officials should serve the public, not their own personal interests. It's time to ban members of Congress and top executive branch officials from trading stocks — and the vast majority of Americans agree. We must pass the #BanStockTradingAct.

Red flag laws keep guns out of the hands of dangerous people. That's why @RepJudyChu and I are partnering on a package of legislation to help communities navigate the system and ensure they have the resources to secure orders to remove firearms.

The PACT Act has already helped thousands of veterans access health care and benefits.

This Barbie believes that @WGAEast, @WGAWest, and @sagaftra deserve a fair contract. ✨

Severe flooding has devastated the Hudson Valley. I brought @POTUS's Infrastructure Coordinator, @MitchLandrieu46, to Mount Vernon for a roundtable with state and local leaders on how we can rebuild and invest in resilient infrastructure that can withstand these disasters.

Beta Technologies is testing innovative electric planes right here in Plattsburgh, New York! Proud to welcome @MitchLandrieu46 here today for a fascinating and informative demonstration about the potential of this new technology.

The Equal Rights Amendment was introduced by Alice Paul in Seneca Falls 100 years ago today.

Women have worked for a century to ratify it. Now it's just one signature away from becoming the 28th Amendment.

It's time for it to finally become law. #ERANow

For far too long, the I-81 viaduct has divided Syracuse.

Today, we finally broke ground to replace it with the Community Grid.

We're reconnecting communities and creating opportunity for small businesses and good-paying local jobs!

Tony Bennett wasn't just a New York icon whose music became the heart and soul of our state. He was an American hero who served in WWII, helped liberate a concentration camp, and joined the Selma-to-Montgomery march and fought for civil rights. He will be sorely missed.

I'm proud that the FEND Off Fentanyl Act will be included in the Senate's annual defense bill.

This legislation would help cut off the illicit flow of fentanyl into our country and bring us one step closer to putting an end to the devastating fentanyl crisis.

"Angellyh was one of the sweetest girls you'd ever meet. But her dreams of becoming a doctor were shattered when she was struck by a stray bullet from a ghost gun."

It was an honor to welcome @Isaac_Herzog to the U.S. Capitol today and to reaffirm the strength of our friendship and bond with Israel.

.@SenHawleyPress and I are introducing the #BanStockTradingAct, which would ban members of Congress, senior executive branch officials, and their immediate family members from holding or trading individual stocks — the most substantive bipartisan effort to date.

I joined @stirfrygrace to enjoy some delicious food and visit iconic businesses that make Manhattan's Chinatown so special. These small, family-owned establishments are a testament to our resilient Asian American community, so let's shop local and #SupportChinatowns!

Ghost guns are homemade, often 3D printed, untraceable firearms — we must do more to stop them from being created in the first place.
 
I'm in NYC to announce the 3D Printed Gun Safety Act, a bill I'm cosponsoring to prevent weapons from being made with the click of a mouse.

.@SenSchumer, @RepPatRyanNY, and I toured the damage at @WestPoint_USMA and surrounding communities after the devastating storms and floods. We’re committed to doing everything we can to get the maximum amount of federal aid to the area ASAP and help rebuild stronger.

The recent floods in New York have shown that we must prepare ourselves for increasingly destructive climate events. Today I'm in Lake Placid to highlight my Rebuild Rural America Act, which would provide funding to build more resilient infrastructure in rural communities.

Fort Ontario in Oswego, New York was the only shelter for Holocaust refugees in the United States. I'm honored to be at @SafeHavenMuseum today, where I'm calling for Fort Ontario to be designated as a national monument so that it will be preserved for generations to come.

I'm in Rochester today to announce my FEND Off Fentanyl Act, which would declare the international trafficking of fentanyl a national emergency. The flow of illicit opioids into the U.S. is killing our loved ones — and I won't stop fighting until this crisis is ended.

Without a regulatory framework, consumers aren't protected.
 
@SenLummis and I are reintroducing the Responsible Financial Innovation Act to ensure that digital assets are properly regulated. finance.yahoo.com/video/cryp…

I stand in solidarity with the members of @sagaftra who are going on strike to demand a fair contract and fair compensation for their work. It's time for the studios to negotiate in good faith to come to a reasonable agreement.

I encourage all New Yorkers to monitor emergency advisories and protect themselves from these dangerous storms.

It was great to see more New Yorkers serving our country abroad during our stop in Germany! While at the @7thATC headquarters, I learned about the training and assistance they are providing to Ukrainian defense forces as they fight to defend their homeland.
While in Italy this week, I enjoyed hearing from New Yorkers ably serving abroad with @SETAF_Africa and the 173rd Airborne Brigade. It was an honor to thank them for their service!

Excited to announce that the Gateway Program is receiving $6.88 billion in federal funding — the most ever for a mass-transit project!
 
I was proud to fight for this essential infrastructure funding delivered by the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law.

buffalonews.com/news/local/k…

The last few weeks have highlighted the urgent need to know exactly what's in our skies. @SenRubioPress and I led a bipartisan letter with 14 of our colleagues calling for full funding for the Unidentified Aerial Phenomena office we created. gillibrand.senate.gov/news/p…

We need to know what is in our skies and protect ourselves from foreign surveillance. That's why I passed legislation requiring the Department of Defense and Intelligence Community to take reports of Unidentified Aerial Phenomena seriously and investigate them thoroughly.

Today we honor and remember the lives lost when Flight 3407 crashed near Buffalo, New York. But thanks to their families and loved ones, who worked tirelessly to prevent a similar tragedy from ever happening again, all of us are safer today.

For years I’ve been supporting Central New York as it’s grown into a cutting-edge tech hub. Today I visited the Innovare Advancement Center in Rome with @LtGovDelgado to announce that I helped secure $3 million to build a new Smart-X “Internet of Things” Living Lab.

We need highly skilled workers to take on the ambitious infrastructure projects funded by the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law. I’m with @RepJoeMorelle and @CityRochesterNY Mayor Malik Evans today to share we secured $600,000 for the Multi-Craft Apprenticeship Preparation Program!

I'm in Niagara Falls today to see the future site of the @NiagaraUniv Academic Innovation Hub, made possible in part by the $1.4 million that @SenSchumer and I secured in the year-end funding bill! This hub will bring new opportunities for education and career advancement to WNY.
A little behind the scenes with @SenatorBaldwin, @maziehirono, @SenatorHassan, @NYSAFLCIO President Mario Cilento, @docramas, and Kalei Grant before the #StateOfTheUnionAddress last night!

.@NYSAFLCIO President Mario Cilento and I were thrilled to hear @POTUS talk about how important it is to pass the #PROAct during last night's State of the Union! When unions are strong, working families are strong. Now let's get the job done and finally pass this bill!
Let’s finish the job to bring down the cost of health care and prescriptions for the American people!

Last year we passed a historic gun safety bill – including my provisions to make gun trafficking a federal crime. That law already helped get guns off the streets of Brooklyn. Now we need to finish the job and keep working to make sure our communities are safe from gun violence.
Thank you, @POTUS! No family should ever have to choose between caring for their family and earning a paycheck. Let’s get the job done and finally pass #PaidLeaveForAll! #StateOfTheUnionAddress

We promised veterans exposed to burn pits and other toxins that we would ensure they get the health care they earned.

We kept that promise. We passed the #PACTAct, and now our veterans will finally get the health care and benefits they deserve. #StateOfTheUnionAddress

.@POTUS's economic plan is working. Thanks to legislation I helped pass and @POTUS signed into law, we're creating thousands of good new jobs across New York in high-tech manufacturing, construction, and health care. And we've still got big plans ahead. #StateOfTheUnionAddress

I'm excited to welcome @NYSAFLCIO President Mario Cilento as my guest to the State of the Union! When unions thrive, working families thrive. We look forward to hearing @POTUS speak tonight about how we can strengthen our unions and level the playing field for working families!

This is why I've fought so hard to increase interagency cooperation and to reduce stigma around reporting UAPs. When we treat our service members with respect and take their reports seriously, our nation is safer and better prepared. nytimes.com/2023/02/06/us/po…

Thank you @FunkyHarlemite for hosting this important roundtable conversation with Black leaders about your top priorities and concerns. Proud to fight beside you for justice, dignity, and opportunity for every Black American.

Proud to stand with @RepEspaillat, @RepDanGoldman, @NydiaVelazquez, and state and local representatives in New York City today to share that I helped secure over $37 million in grant awards to help improve road safety and address traffic fatalities throughout New York.

I was proud to lead the fight to designate the Stonewall Inn as the first national monument commemorating #LGBTQ history. And last Friday, @DeborahJGlick and I toured the future site of @stonewallvisctr, where this history will be preserved and celebrated for generations to come!
Proud to join @RepJerryNadler, @NYSComptroller, @NYCComptroller, @AMEddieGibbs, @JulieMenin, @MarkLevineNYC, and @HunterPresident for @AlexBores' inauguration ceremony!

Thank you @TheRevAl for welcoming me to the #NANSaturdayActionRally. It was an honor to join you and Gwen Carr yesterday, and I'm proud to fight alongside you to pass the Justice in Policing Act. We must never stop fighting for justice and decency for every American.

It was my privilege to invite @ARBernard to give the opening prayer as guest chaplain before the #AAFaithLeaders Summit I hosted last month, and it was an honor to be invited to join him for services at @cccinfoorg today!

30 years ago today, the Family and Medical Leave Act was signed into law. It made a huge difference for families. But it's time to go further.
 
No one should EVER have to choose between caring for themselves or a loved one or losing their paycheck. It's time for #PaidLeave!

I strongly support this proposal by @US_FDA to roll back restrictions against gay and bisexual men who want to donate blood, which I've been fighting for for years. Everyone willing to step up to save a life should be welcomed with open arms. nbcnews.com/health/health-ne…

It's always an honor to welcome @POTUS and @VP at the National Prayer Breakfast! Thank you to @vashtimckenzie and @jimcymbala for leading us in prayer this morning, and to @BTChoir for their incredible performance.
Behind the scenes at the 2023 National Prayer Breakfast this morning with @POTUS, @VP, @RepLucyMcBath, @SenatorRounds, @vashtimckenzie, and @jimcymbala!

We all love our families. And whether you need to care for someone who's sick, a new child, or an elderly parent, you shouldn't have to choose between your family and a paycheck.
 
It's time to pass #PaidLeave and modernize FMLA.
Always a joy to welcome @ualbany students to my office to learn more about how the Senate works! Enjoy your semester in Washington, D.C.!

This #BlackHistoryMonth, as we celebrate the Black leaders and trailblazers who have shaped and influenced our nation, we must recommit ourselves to dismantling systemic racism and fighting for equality so that every Black American has the opportunity to live the American dream.

It's time to modernize FMLA and finally pass #PaidLeaveForAll.

I'm live now with @rosadelauro, @SenDuckworth, @SenatorDurbin, @SenTinaSmith, and our House colleagues to re-introduce the #FAMILYAct and introduce our package of bills to modernize FMLA. https://https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1OwxWwrPypQxQ

The Hudson Tunnel Project will make rail travel more reliable for thousands of commuters who travel in & out of NYC daily. Proud to be here with @POTUS and our incredible infrastructure workers to see this project set into motion, with help from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law!

Thank you to Bishop Rivera and Pastor Rivera Leon for welcoming me to service at The Sanctuary church this weekend! I'm so deeply inspired by your tireless commitment and relentless dedication to your congregation.

My friend @RepEspaillat has been an amazing leader for the 13th District of New York! It was my honor to join him at his State of the District today to see the powerful impact he has left on this vibrant and engaged community and to help share the victories he has achieved.

Proud to join @SenSchumer, @IAmKRSOne, @GSimoneParker, @DJFlash4eva, @ERICB, and more legends today to share that along with @RepBowman, we secured $5 million for the @uhhmuseum to preserve and celebrate hip hop music’s history and influence right where it began in the Bronx!
I'm excited to join you today!
More must be done at every level of government to eliminate violence and brutality from our criminal justice system and to change the circumstances that make such atrocities possible.

Tyre Nichols’ death is outrageous and horrifying, and I am grateful that the officers responsible were quickly charged with his murder. I am praying for Tyre’s mother, son, family and friends, along with the Memphis community and our country.

I'm devastated that seven lives were taken in this horrifying terrorist attack at a synagogue in Jerusalem on Shabbat. I'm keeping the victims and their loved ones in my prayers. May their memories be a blessing.

This International Holocaust Remembrance Day, we honor and remember the millions of people who were brutally murdered during the Holocaust. We must never forget the deadly consequences of bigotry and antisemitism and commit ourselves every day to fighting violent hate.
Thank you for joining us at the #AAFaithLeaders summit yesterday, @SenatorWarnock!

Thank you to everyone who joined us for yesterday's #AAFaithLeaders Summit, including @TheRevAl, @SenSchumer, @SenatorWarnock, @SenBooker, @SenKaineTeam, my House colleagues, and all of our attendees! I'm so inspired by the stories you shared and proud to serve alongside you!
It was my honor to invite @DrARBernard to the Senate floor to deliver today's opening prayer. Thank you @Chaplain_Black for welcoming us today!

Last Congress I passed legislation to deliver health care for veterans and 9/11 first responders, make gun trafficking a federal crime, and create jobs throughout New York. I'm proud of what we got done – and I've got even bigger goals for 2023 and beyond. cityandstateny.com/personali…

My heart is with the loved ones of those killed in last night's devastating shooting. No one should have to fear gun violence while celebrating the Lunar New Year with their friends and family. We must put a stop to this horrific gun violence that is terrorizing our communities.

Today should've been the 50th anniversary of #RoeVWade, before extreme Trump-appointed Supreme Court justices overturned it.
 
I still believe in our basic, fundamental rights to freedom, privacy, and bodily autonomy. And I won't stop fighting to restore those rights.

It was an honor to meet our service members stationed at Al Dhafra Air Base this week. Thank you for taking the time to talk with me about how my work in the Senate can support you during your service. I'm so inspired and impressed by your commitment to serving our country!

As our bipartisan delegation trip to the Abraham Accords member countries arrived in Israel, we visited @yadvashem. We must never forget the millions of Jews killed during the Holocaust, and we must do everything we can to fight the rising tide of antisemitism and violence.

While in Abu Dhabi for our bipartisan delegation trip to the Abraham Accords member countries, we met with @AJCGlobal to discuss opportunities to increase cooperation and strengthen relationships in the region. Thank you for all your work!

It was an honor to meet with Ambassador Bondy, the staff of @USEmbassyManama, and @us5thfleet — including these service members from New York! Thank you for your dedicated service to our country, even when it brings you so far from home.

Our next stop on our bipartisan delegation trip to the Abraham Accords member countries brought us to Bahrain, where we spent multiple productive days meeting with senior government officials and members of the National Assembly and visited a synagogue in Manama.

As we celebrate Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s legacy today, we must continue his work to build a more equitable and just future for every American. We must keep fighting to protect our democracy and root out hate, racism, and bigotry once and for all.

I'm proud to join @SenJackyRosen and @SenatorLankford for a bipartisan delegation trip to the Abraham Accords member countries, starting in Morocco. I look forward to meeting with senior officials to discuss how we can strengthen the relationships fostered by the Accords.
I am so grateful for the advocacy of Jennifer Pryear and all the other parents who fought so long and so hard to get illegal guns off the street. It is an honor to fight alongside you.

Over 50 guns off the streets in Brooklyn today using the bipartisan gun trafficking legislation we passed last summer. I wrote the bill after meeting the parents of a Brooklyn high school student who was tragically killed by a stray bullet in 2009. cnn.com/2023/01/11/us/gun-tr…

The United States is the only developed nation in the world that doesn't guarantee workers #PaidLeave. This is the year to change that.
 
I'm proud to lead 15 of my colleagues on a letter calling on @POTUS to include a national #PaidLeave program in his budget.

I helped secure over $130 million in the end-of-year funding bill to support our overburdened health care system. We're investing in:
 
👨‍⚕️ Health Care Staffing
🤰 Maternal Health
😷 Pandemic Preparedness
🦟 Research for Lyme and tick-borne diseases
whec.com/top-news/sen-gillib…

Every New Yorker deserves access to safe, clean drinking water. I'm proud to have secured $5 million to help extend public water to Calverton homes whose water wells were contaminated by toxic PFAS chemicals.

On September 11th, law enforcement officers risked their lives to protect their fellow New Yorkers. This #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay, let's show our appreciation by fully funding the 9/11 Health Program and ensuring they get the health care a grateful nation promised them.

Every family deserves #PaidLeave, including our military families, who sacrifice so much for our country. I was proud to help secure #PaidLeave for our troops after the birth or adoption of their kids — and I won't stop fighting until all Americans have #PaidLeave.

Michigan has been so lucky to have you, @SenStabenow! I've been proud to fight beside you all these years, and I look forward to helping you finish your term strong by passing the next five-year Farm Bill together!

The new Micron megacomplex is a fantastic opportunity for CNY, and we need to invest in our infrastructure to meet the moment & maximize our economic growth! I'm at @SyracuseAirport to share that @SenSchumer and I secured $2.5 million for the airport in the year-end funding bill!

Our veterans kept us safe – and we made a promise to always care for them. @SenSchumer and I are proud to be at @fingerlakeshcs's Canandaigua VA Medical Center to share we secured $62.5 million in the end-of-year funding bill to renovate and expand this facility.

When Buffalo was buried by a historic snowstorm, @feedmorewny worked around the clock to deliver desperately-needed aid and life-saving necessities. @SenSchumer and I were proud to support their work by securing them $2 million of federal funding in the year-end funding bill.
The past few weeks have been horrible for Buffalo. But we will recover. @SenSchumer and I are asking @POTUS to swiftly authorize a Major Disaster Declaration should @GovKathyHochul ask for one.
Congratulations to my friend @PattyMurray, who made history today! The Senate will be in good hands with a fierce champion for women and families like Patty at the helm.
Thank you, @SpeakerPelosi, for your extraordinary service to this country.
.@NewYorkStateAG has done incredible work for the people of New York, and I’m so proud to work alongside her for another term. Congrats!
Congratulations, @GovKathyHochul! I’m so proud to work alongside you again. I know that together we can build an even brighter future for New York!
We accomplished a lot in 2022 that we can be proud of — now let's carry that momentum into 2023. Happy New Year!
